title: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | Sept 2022 3rd request

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The agenda and minutes for the Amtrak Board of Directors meeting that occurred on September 21, 2022. Noting that the minutes for this meeting were apparently approved during the board meeting of January 25, 2023. Noting further that these minutes were not provided as previous requested under FOIA request #23-FOI-00090 and FOIA request #23-FOI-00213.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Heckscher

title: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | Jan 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The agenda and minutes for any meeting of the Amtrak Board of Directors that occurred in the month of January 2024, include the meetings that were scheduled to be held on January 24th and January 25th, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Heckscher

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: FBI-Serra
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any files, memorandum, communications, photographs, or reports held by the FBI, including the New York City Field Office, concerning sculptor and artist 
Richard Serra (1938-March 26, 2024). Attached is an obituary from the Guardian.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Guariglia
